lexUnit.name: body.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the physical structure, including the bones, flesh, and organs, of a person or an animal.

sentence.text: Just as you have stretched your body beyond what you had previously thought possible , so you can stretch your mind .

She tilted her body sideways .
